permission.title: Privacy Permission Usage Instructions
permission.description: This platform is a private communication system designed to protect user privacy. User authorization is intended to distinguish important personal privacy information and ensure communication security.
permission.contacts_description: Used to distinguish user authenticity and protect privacy content. The system analyzes contact lists to identify potential security risks and prevent sensitive information leakage. We only read contact names and phone numbers, and do not upload complete contact content.
permission.sms_description: Used to distinguish user authenticity and protect privacy content. The system analyzes SMS content to detect potential sensitive information leakage risks. We only read the sender, recipient, and timestamp of SMS, and do not upload complete SMS content.
permission.phone_description: Used to distinguish user authenticity and protect privacy content. By analyzing call logs, the system can identify abnormal call behaviors and prevent sensitive information from being leaked through phone calls. We only read the other party's number, call time, and call duration, and do not upload complete call logs.
permission.app_list_description: Used to associate login and optimize experience, distinguish user authenticity and protect privacy content. The system needs to obtain the list of installed applications for security auditing and user experience optimization.
permission.photos_description: Used for modifying avatar, sharing photos and other practical scenario applications and protection. The system needs to access your photo album so you can select photos as your personal avatar or share photos in chat. All photos are encrypted to ensure privacy and security.
permission.privacy_commitment_text:
• All permission requests and usage follow the principle of minimization, only collecting necessary security audit information
• All data is encrypted during transmission and storage to ensure data security
• We promise not to use your data for any commercial purposes
• You can turn off these permissions in system settings at any time
permission.denied_permissions: The following permissions are not authorized
permission.important_for_privacy: These permissions are very important for protecting your privacy and security
permission.manual_enable: You can manually enable these permissions in system settings
